void CollidePSA::updateSoundTag (  )  [protected]

This internal method updates the sound tag, and should be called whenever one of the soundProject_, soundGroup_ or soundName_ variables have changed.

If any of the constituent variables are empty, the sound tag is invalid and will be set to an empty string.
